import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { GlobalDataContext } from "../../context/context"; import { FaCalendar, FaMapMarkerAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; function ContactUs() { const { rpdata } = useContext(GlobalDataContext); return (

{rpdata?.dbPrincipal?.location?.[0].address}

Location
{rpdata?.dbPrincipal?.phones?.map((item, index) => { return (

{item.phone}

 ); })} Phone

{rpdata?.dbPrincipal?.workdays?.[0].day}

{rpdata?.dbPrincipal?.workHours?.[0].hour}

); } export default ContactUs;
